short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A browser extension that tells you a dad joke

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: I created this extension for my team lead at work. In order to help our team he always requests a Dad joke in exchange for his time. So I made him this extension to generate infinite Dad jokes.
